title: Luxurious Indian Wedding Gift Packaging Website for Shree Radha Traders

requirements.text: Create a comprehensive admin authentication system supporting multiple admin logins with secure credential management

quotes: Multiple admin can login to website

acceptanceCriteria: Multiple admins can register and log in with unique credentials
Admin sessions are secure and properly authenticated
Unauthorized users cannot access admin features

requirements.text: Build an admin dashboard with complete product management capabilities: upload product photos, delete photos, edit product descriptions, add/remove product categories, and update pricing

quotes: Admin can: Upload new product photos, Delete photos, Edit product descriptions, Add new product categories, Update pricing

acceptanceCriteria: Admin can upload multiple product photos with preview
Admin can delete individual product photos
Admin can edit product descriptions and pricing in real-time
Admin can create, edit, and delete product categories
Changes are immediately reflected on the public website

requirements.text: Implement admin functionality to edit homepage banners with image upload and replacement capabilities
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can upload new banner images for the hero section
Admin can replace existing banners
Banner changes are immediately visible on the homepage

requirements.text: Create an admin inquiry management system to view, track, and manage customer inquiries submitted through the contact form
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can view all submitted inquiries with timestamp
Inquiries display customer name, phone number, and message
Admin can mark inquiries as read or resolved

requirements.text: Design a hero section with wedding-themed background image, heading 'Premium Wedding Gift Packaging for Grand Celebrations', subheading 'Bulk Orders | Pan India Delivery', and two CTA buttons: 'View Collection' and 'Order on WhatsApp'

quotes: Heading: 'Premium Wedding Gift Packaging for Grand Celebrations'

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays a luxurious wedding-themed background
Heading and subheading are prominently displayed with readable contrast
'View Collection' button scrolls to product gallery
'Order on WhatsApp' button opens WhatsApp chat with pre-filled message

requirements.text: Create an About Us section featuring the story of Shree Radha Traders, highlighting their position as a trusted wholesale supplier from Churu, Rajasthan, with emphasis on experience and quality focus

quotes: Mention: Trusted wholesale supplier from Churu, Rajasthan

acceptanceCriteria: About Us section includes compelling copy about Shree Radha Traders
Section mentions Churu, Rajasthan location
Content emphasizes trust, experience, and quality

requirements.text: Build a product gallery with categories (Fancy Potlis, Designer Envelopes, Wedding Pouches, Jute Bags, Return Gifts, Corporate Gifting Options) using a grid layout with image zoom functionality

quotes: Categories: Fancy Potlis, Designer Envelopes, Wedding Pouches, Jute Bags, Return Gifts

acceptanceCriteria: Products are organized into six distinct categories
Gallery displays products in a responsive grid layout
Clicking a product image triggers zoom/lightbox view
Each product shows description and pricing
Categories can be filtered or navigated separately

requirements.text: Create a 'Why Choose Us' section highlighting four key value propositions: Premium Quality Material, Wholesale Prices, Fast Delivery, and Trusted by Wedding Planners

quotes: Premium Quality Material, Wholesale Prices, Fast Delivery, Trusted by Wedding Planners

acceptanceCriteria: Section displays four distinct benefit cards or items
Each benefit is clearly labeled and visually distinct
Content reinforces trust and value for bulk buyers

requirements.text: Implement a comprehensive contact section with click-to-call phone number, WhatsApp direct chat button, Instagram link, inquiry form (Name, Phone, Message fields), and embedded Google Map showing Churu, Rajasthan location
acceptanceCriteria: Phone number is clickable and initiates call on mobile devices
WhatsApp button opens direct chat with Shree Radha Traders
Instagram icon links to company profile
Inquiry form captures Name, Phone, and Message and submits to backend
Google Map is embedded showing Churu, Rajasthan
Form submission is validated and provides user feedback

requirements.text: Design a footer section with social media icons (WhatsApp, Instagram), quick navigation links, and copyright text '© Shree Radha Traders'
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays social media icons with working links
Quick links navigate to main sections of the website
Copyright notice is clearly visible

requirements.text: Add a floating WhatsApp button that remains visible across all pages and opens direct chat with Shree Radha Traders when clicked
acceptanceCriteria: WhatsApp button floats in bottom-right corner on all pages
Button is always visible while scrolling
Clicking opens WhatsApp with pre-filled business contact

requirements.text: Apply a luxurious royal color palette throughout the website using Maroon as primary, Gold as accent, and Cream and Soft Pink as complementary colors to create a traditional yet modern Indian wedding aesthetic

quotes: Use a royal color palette: Maroon, Gold, Cream, Soft Pink
Design should feel traditional yet modern

acceptanceCriteria: Maroon is used as the primary brand color
Gold accents are used for highlights and CTAs
Cream and Soft Pink provide balance and elegance
Overall design feels cohesive, luxurious, and wedding-appropriate
Color scheme is consistent across all sections

requirements.text: Ensure the entire website is fully responsive and optimized for mobile, tablet, and desktop viewing experiences
acceptanceCriteria: Website displays correctly on mobile devices (320px and up)
Layout adapts smoothly to tablet and desktop screens
Navigation is touch-friendly on mobile
All interactive elements are easily accessible on small screens

constraints: Use royal color palette: Maroon (primary), Gold (accent), Cream, Soft Pink
Design must feel traditional yet modern with Indian wedding aesthetic
WhatsApp integration must use direct chat links, not third-party APIs
Admin panel must support multiple simultaneous admin users
All contact links (phone, WhatsApp, Instagram) must use native protocols (tel:, whatsapp:, https:)
nonGoals: Payment gateway integration or e-commerce checkout
Real-time chat functionality beyond WhatsApp links
Customer account creation or login for non-admin users
